statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_records;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_feedback FROM feedback_records WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, peer_id, peer_feedback FROM feedback_records WHERE teacher_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback_records ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT teacher_id, peer_id, teacher_feedback, peer_feedback FROM feedback_records WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_records WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_feedback FROM feedback_records WHERE peer_id = 2;
SELECT id, teacher_id, teacher_feedback, peer_feedback FROM feedback_records WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_records WHERE peer_id = 4 AND teacher_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_feedback, peer_feedback FROM feedback_records WHERE id < 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback_from_teachers;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_from_teachers ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT teacher_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_from_teachers WHERE teacher_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_from_peers WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_from_peers ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, teacher_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_from_teachers;
SELECT feedback_id, peer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback_from_peers WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, teacher_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_from_teachers ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback_from_peers WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT * FROM feedback_from_teachers JOIN feedback_from_peers ON feedback_from_teachers.feedback_id = feedback_from_peers.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM TeacherFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM PeerFeedback;
SELECT teacher_id, feedback_text, rating FROM TeacherFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackSession ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT session_id, teacher_id, rating FROM FeedbackSession WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM TeacherFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM PeerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT teacher_id, feedback_text, rating FROM TeacherFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackSession WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT session_id, teacher_id, peer_id, feedback_date, rating FROM FeedbackSession ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM teachers;
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name FROM teachers WHERE subject_taught = 'Math';
SELECT peer_name, peer_role FROM peers ORDER BY peer_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;

SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught, peer_name, peer_role FROM teachers INNER JOIN feedback_relationship ON teachers.teacher_id = feedback_relationship.teacher_id INNER JOIN peers ON peers.peer_id = feedback_relationship.peer_id;
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE teacher_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught FROM teachers ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT peer_name, peer_role FROM peers WHERE peer_role = 'Lead';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4 AND feedback_date >= '2021-10-01';

SELECT teachers.teacher_name, feedback.feedback_text FROM teachers INNER JOIN feedback_relationship ON teachers.teacher_id = feedback_relationship.teacher_id INNER JOIN feedback ON feedback_relationship.feedback_id = feedback.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM Teachers;
SELECT name, subject, experience_years FROM Teachers ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT student_id, name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 90;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT teacher_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM Feedback GROUP BY teacher_id;
SELECT * FROM Teachers ORDER BY name DESC, experience_years ASC
SELECT teacher_id, name, subject FROM Teachers WHERE experience_years > 5 ORDER BY subject

SELECT Students.name AS student_name, Courses.course_name, Feedback.rating FROM Students JOIN Feedback ON Students.student_id = Feedback.student_id JOIN Courses ON Feedback.teacher_id = Courses.teacher_id WHERE Feedback.rating > 4
SELECT teacher_id, name, COUNT(course_id) AS num_courses FROM Teachers LEFT JOIN Courses ON Teachers.teacher_id = Courses.teacher_id GROUP BY teacher_id, name ORDER BY num_courses DESC
SELECT DISTINCT Students.name, Peers.peer_name FROM Students JOIN Peers ON Students.student_id = Peers.student_id WHERE Peers.recommendation = 'Good'
